name: deegree-3.4.32
body:
## What's Changed
* Use trimmed OGC schemas zip file (reducing size by approx. 32 MB) by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1349


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/compare/deegree-3.4.31...deegree-3.4.32

name: deegree-3.4.31
body:
## What's Changed
* Create spatial index in PostGISDDLCreator by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1318
* Fixed possible NPE and removed unused code by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1317
* Upgrades reflections to v0.9.12 by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1311
* Upgrades gson to v2.2.4 by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1310
* Upgrades tomcat bundle by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1309
* Fixed javadoc and maven site generation by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1305
* Upgrades asciidoc plugin and pdf producer by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1302
* Add GZIP compression support and an extension point for custom FeatureInputStreams to the loader tool by @stephanr in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1292
* Enhance GmlTool to reduce generated mapping by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1279
* Improved log message by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1255
* Enhancements of the REST interface by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/938
* Fix serveral bugs in REST API by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1196
* Enhance parsing of SLDs by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1195
* Fix xml stream writer test on windows, replaced xml-matcher with xmlunit by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1329
* Fixing the maven phase to copy the log4j2.properties configuration file to WEB-INF/classes by @julianzz98 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1327
* Enhance GmlTool to write mapping for GML Time properties by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1278
* Fixed documentation on DisableDynamicSchema by @stempler in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1315
* Disabling concurrent builds by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1332
* Fix rendering of geometries in deegree by @stephanr in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1330
* Fix rendering of geometries in deegree by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1192


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/compare/deegree-3.4.30...deegree-3.4.31

name: deegree-3.4.30
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix GmlGetFeatureHandler not excluding features that are already exported by @julianzz98 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1314
* Fixes packaging of log4j2.properties file in WAR file by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1312
* Upgrades log4j2 to v2.17.2 and slf4j to 1.7.36 by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1304
* Remove duplicate JCL dependency by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1308


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/compare/deegree-3.4.29...deegree-3.4.30

name: deegree-3.4.29
body:
## What's Changed
* Upgrade Spring dependencies by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1301
* Enhance FeatureInspector with the context of the transaction, if available by @stephanr in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1290
* upgraded enforcer plugin and added ban duplicate classes rule by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1303


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/compare/deegree-3.4.28...deegree-3.4.29

name: deegree-3.4.28
body:
## What's Changed
* Fixed Error "Table "DBF_INDEX" already exists" by @julianzz98 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1299
* Improve curve linearization by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1281
* Optimize logging for feature references to speed up batch import jobs by @stephanr in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1286
* Optimize logging of SQLFeaturestore in initialization phase by @stephanr in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1289


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/compare/deegree-3.4.27...deegree-3.4.28

name: deegree-3.4.27
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump h2 from 1.3.171 to 2.1.210 and fix issue in creation of table LOCKS by @stephanr in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1296
* Bump h2 from 1.3.171 to 2.1.210 by @dependabot in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1270
* Enhanced WMS GetMap request by the vendor specific parameters FILTERPROPERTY and FILTERVALUE to filter the underlying data source by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/819
* Upgrade to most recent MS SQL Server JDBC Driver version for JDK 8 by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1026
* Fixing wps client bug: LiteralInputs don't have to have a DataType specified by @awst-baum in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/843
* Add geometry fixes by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1035


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/compare/deegree-3.4.26...deegree-3.4.27

name: deegree-3.4.26
body:
## What's Changed
* Ensure that tmp files are deleted with enabled buffering in WFS and when a request is closed by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1280
* Remove deegree-sqldialect-postgis dependency from deegree-featurestore-sql by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1181


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/compare/deegree-3.4.25...deegree-3.4.26

name: deegree-3.4.25
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump postgresql from 42.2.25 to 42.3.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1277
* Remove oracle profile from deegree-tools-gml and deegree-featurestore-sql by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1275


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/compare/deegree-3.4.24...deegree-3.4.25

name: deegree-3.4.24
body:
## What's Changed
* Added soapUI test module deegree-integrations-tests by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1153
* Upgrade Batik to v1.14 by @copierrj in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1267
* Bump xercesImpl from 2.12.0 to 2.12.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1272
* Bump tomcat from 8.5.66 to 8.5.75 in /deegree-services/deegree-webservices-tomcat-bundle by @dependabot in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1273
* Bump postgresql from 42.2.8 to 42.2.25 by @dependabot in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1274
* Fix Oracle 11g.R2 compability, upgrade Oracle Driver to 19.3.0.0 and remove use of profile for public available Oracle database drivers by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1206
* Enhanced implementation for WFS 2.0 response paging by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1128
* Fix JAI dependencies by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1256
* Updated enforcer plugin configuration by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/924
* Support of CRS:84 in GdalLayer by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1199


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/compare/deegree-3.4.23...deegree-3.4.24

name: deegree-3.4.23
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump log4j2 to v2.17.1 to resolve CVE-2021-44832 by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1254
* Improved image comparison for WMS and WMTS similarity tests by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1245
* Fix request logging by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1237
* Updated GML Tools CLI documentation and command names by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1242
* Fixed position of SupportedRequests in deegreeWFS configuration by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1136


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/compare/deegree-3.4.22...deegree-3.4.23

name: deegree-3.4.22
body:
## What's Changed
* Upgrade to Apache Log4j2 2.16.0 by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1247
* Bump httpclient from 4.3.6 to 4.5.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1148
* Fixed Shape files for workspace used by WMS integration tests  by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1243
* Revert "Fixed Shape files for workspace used by WMS integration tests " by @copierrj in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1249
* Upgrade to JTS 1.18.2 by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1244
* Improved handling of strict parameter only if geometry parameter is passed by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1239
* WMS 1.3: Throw exception when using invalid service parameter in GetCapabilities request by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1240
* WMS 1.3: Throw correct exception type when requesting erroneous version in GetMap request by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1241
* Bump log4j-core from 2.16.0 to 2.17.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1253
* Bump log4j-api from 2.16.0 to 2.17.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1252


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/compare/deegree-3.4.20...deegree-3.4.22

name: deegree-3.4.21
body:
## What's Changed
* Upgrade to Apache Log4j2 2.16.0 by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1247
* Bump httpclient from 4.3.6 to 4.5.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1148
* Fixed Shape files for workspace used by WMS integration tests  by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1243
* Revert "Fixed Shape files for workspace used by WMS integration tests " by @copierrj in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1249
* Upgrade to JTS 1.18.2 by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1244
* Improved handling of strict parameter only if geometry parameter is passed by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1239
* WMS 1.3: Throw exception when using invalid service parameter in GetCapabilities request by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1240
* WMS 1.3: Throw correct exception type when requesting erroneous version in GetMap request by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1241


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/compare/deegree-3.4.20...deegree-3.4.21

name: deegree-3.4.20
body:
## What's Changed
* Add check of transparent parameter for WMS by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1216
* SchemaLocation points to GML 3.2.2 when GML 3.2.1 is requested by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1127
* Removed redundant repository elements from sub modules by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1142
* Moved module deegree-spring to uncoupled by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1227
* Integrate GmlTool into deegree3 repository by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1229
* Added log4j configuration files for WMS and WMTS integration tests  by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1230
* Enhancement of the deegree WMTS documentation by @julianzz98 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1221
* Add myself to CONTRIBUTORS.md by @ejn in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1125
* Upgrade Jersey to 1.19.4 and commons-fileupload to 1.4 by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1031
* Bump commons-io from 2.4 to 2.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1141
* Bump tomcat from 8.5.54 to 8.5.66 in /deegree-services/deegree-webservices-tomcat-bundle by @dependabot in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1171

## New Contributors
* @julianzz98 made their first contribution in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1221
* @ejn made their first contribution in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1125

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/compare/deegree-3.4.19...deegree-3.4.20

name: Bugfix release 3.4.19
body:
## What's Changed
* Add data to utah workspace by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1213
* Configure JDBC connection of deegree-workspace-csw by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1214
* Fix disabling of ManageStoredQueries by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1147
* Add check of WMS service parameter by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1226
* Return exception when mandatory version parameter is missing WMS 1.3 GetMap request by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1218
* GetFeature request where the BBOX predicate refers to a feature property that is not geometry-valued shall throw an exception by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1220
* Fix exception type for WMS by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1219


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/compare/deegree-3.4.18...deegree-3.4.19

name: Bugfix release 3.4.18
body:
## What's Changed
* Move workspaces by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1177
* Clean up and fix workspaces by @dstenger in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1178
* Migrated findbugs plugin to spotbugs plugin by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1152
* remove obsolete .travis.yml by @stephanr in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1179
* Minor improvements of deegree webservice handbook by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1166
* Create FUNDING.yml by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1185
* Skipped failing integration test by @lgoltz in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1215
* Fixes download url using nexus 3 rest api by @tfr42 in https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/pull/1168


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/deegree/deegree3/compare/deegree-3.4.17...deegree-3.4.18

## Download
[Download deegree web services 3.4.18](https://repo.deegree.org/service/rest/repository/browse/public/org/deegree/deegree-webservices/3.4.18/)
